persona.name: Sage
persona.bio: Sage, a 25-year-old full-time crypto trader, is known for their frugal yet innovative approach to the volatile world of cryptocurrency. Despite being a novice, Sage quickly gained attention for their trendsetting strategies, often prioritizing value-driven investments and leveraging cutting-edge tools to navigate the market. With a keen eye for emerging trends, Sage is steadily building a reputation as a forward-thinking investor in the crypto community.
